improvement_suggestions: Broaden the YARA rule patterns to accommodate variations in the code sequence. Specifically, introduce wildcards (`?`) to allow for flexibility in the byte values.  Instead of a fixed skip offset, consider a more dynamic approach or a different bypassing strategy altogether.
